pageProduct.name: Trilogy Vitamin C Polishing Powder 30g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Cleanse, polish and brighten with rice starch, vitamin C, manadrin

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Gently buffs, brightens and smooths complexions with powerful antioxidant vitamin C.

Ingredients

Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Ascorbic Acid, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Extract, Parfum, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Xanthan Gum, hydroxycitronellal* citronellol* limonene*

*Components of natural essential oils

Directions

Pour 1/2 a teaspoon into hands. Add a splash of warm water and gently mix creating a cleansing milk. Massage into face avoiding they eye area, then rinse with warm water.
